attributes.action: Include the Transgender Community in the Conversion Therapy Ban
attributes.additional_details: 45% of trans youth have attempted suicide. Failure to act will result in the deaths of more innocent people. The exclusion of the trans community sends a clear and unacceptable message. Conversion therapy should be banned with no exceptions!
attributes.background: Include the transgender community in the conversion therapy ban. We stand together as one.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure Trans people are fully protected under any conversion therapy ban: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613556

Ban LGBT+ Conversion Therapy: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613518
